body.name: Hanes Men’s Total Support Pouch Boxer Briefs, X-Temp Cooling, Moisture-Wicking Underwear, Regular, Long-leg and Trunk, 3-Pack
features: VALUE YOU LOVE – This sexy men’s underwear pack comes with 3 pairs of Total Support Pouch moisture-wicking underwear, in your choice of regular Boxer Briefs, Long-Leg Boxer Briefs, or Men's Trunk Underwear. Note: Colors/patterns may vary depending on availability.
HELPS PREVENT CHAFING – Hanes Total Support Pouch has a breathable mesh liner that separates and supports for anti-chafing comfort that lasts.

STARTS COOL. KEEPS COOL – X-Temp Technology men's boxers are designed to adapt to your temperature and activity to help you stay cool, no matter what your day brings. Targeted mesh zones make them breathable.
ODOR CONTROL – Advanced odor protection plus moisture-wicking performance fabric help keep you dry.
COMFORT YOU EXPECT – Comfort Flex waistband keeps your men's underwear with pouch from pinching and binding, plus they're tagless for itch-free comfort. No-ride-up legs stay in place.
QUALITY FABRIC – Our anti-chafing underwear is made from soft, lightweight stretch fabric that moves with you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They fit and feel great
reviews.reviewText: First and foremost, the comfort provided by these underwear is unparalleled. The ball pouch design is an absolute game-changer. It offers optimal support and separation, allowing for a breathable and friction-free experience. The snug yet gentle fit ensures that everything stays in place, eliminating any discomfort or readjustment throughout the day. It's a true relief to finally find underwear that caters to the unique needs of men.Speaking of support, this product goes above and beyond in this department. The ball pouch provides excellent lift and containment, ensuring that everything is securely held in position. This not only enhances comfort but also adds a confidence boost, knowing that there is reliable support where it matters most. Whether engaging in physical activities or simply going about my daily routine, this underwear offers the ideal level of support, contributing to an overall pleasant experience.The craftsmanship of these underwear is exceptional. The materials used are of premium quality, offering a soft and luxurious feel against the skin. The attention to detail is evident in every stitch, as there are no rough edges or irritating seams that can cause discomfort. The waistband is comfortable yet secure, providing a snug fit without digging into the skin. These underwear truly exemplify durability, withstanding multiple washes without losing their shape or softness.Furthermore, the design of these underwear is both stylish and functional. The ball pouch is discreetly integrated, providing a sleek and streamlined appearance. The overall fit is fantastic, hugging the body without feeling restrictive. Additionally, the range of colors and patterns available allows for personal expression and adds a touch of excitement to the everyday essentials.I must also commend the brand's commitment to customer satisfaction. From the moment of purchase to delivery, the entire experience was seamless. The product arrived promptly, well-packaged, and ready to impress. The size chart provided was accurate, ensuring that I selected the perfect fit without any guesswork. The brand's attention to detail and dedication to customer support are commendable, making the buying process a breeze.In conclusion, I wholeheartedly endorse this men's underwear with a ball pouch. It provides unbeatable comfort, exceptional support, and a stylish design. The craftsmanship is top-notch, showcasing the brand's commitment to quality. If you're looking to elevate your underwear game and experience a new level of comfort and support, look no further. These underwear have transformed my daily routine, and I have no doubt they will do the same for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These boxer briefs redefine comfort and support! Crafted with a perfect blend of soft, breathable fabrics, they offer an unparalleled fit that feels like a second skin. The elastic waistband provides a secure yet gentle hold, ensuring these briefs stay in place without digging in. The sleek design and smooth seams make them virtually invisible under clothing, while the ergonomic pouch offers excellent support. Whether you're hitting the gym, lounging at home, or going about your day, these boxer briefs are the epitome of comfort and style. Elevate your underwear game and experience the greatness yourself

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Giving My Junk the VIP Treatment!
reviews.reviewText: Ladies and gentlemen, hold onto your seats because we're diving into the world of the Hanes Men's Total Support Pouch Boxer Briefs – the boxer briefs that have my "junk" feeling like a superstar on vacation!Let's talk about the star of the show: the total support pouch. This thing is like a VIP section for your precious cargo, giving it the kind of support and comfort that we all deserve. No more awkward readjustments or uncomfortable shifts – my buddy down there has found his true calling in life, and it's in these boxer briefs!But wait, there's more! These boxer briefs are like a breath of fresh air... literally. The breathable fabric lets my nether regions live their best life, keeping them cool and collected even during my wildest adventures. It's like a spa day for my family jewels – they've never been happier.And let's not forget the fit – these boxer briefs are like a second skin, hugging all the right places without making me feel like a sausage in a casing. The waistband is a loyal companion, holding things up without feeling like a medieval torture device. It's like having a personal cheerleader for my hips!Now, I know what you're thinking – "But what about after washing them?" Fear not, my friends! These boxer briefs are like the gift that keeps on giving. Even after multiple rounds in the washing machine, they come out looking and feeling as fresh as a daisy. It's like magic, but for your underwear.In short....ehhh it's fine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These came is a "big man" size which was wonderful. My son was very happy with the fit, colors, and feel of the fabric. Hanes is a great, well known company and they continued with this product. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these as a replacement for my Duluth boxers and wasn't sure how they'll be. Hanes has been around a long time and I haven't used them since I was a kid. I saw the reviews on them, compared the cost and figured to give them a try. Well worth it. Not too tight, soft fabric and not too thick of waistband. Just need to see how long they'll hold up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and don’t make you sweat
reviews.reviewText: These are very comfortable boxers with a cool pouch to keep your groin from getting too sweaty or sticky. I don’t know what else to say except that they’re a great pair of boxer, briefs, nice and cool and easy to breathe in them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Admittedly i have been free balling for years, this may change it.
reviews.reviewText: So i haven't been a fan of underwear since my school days, I decided to try some again and was seeking something that could help prevent chaffing. So far i have worn two pairs to work recently, Couldn't get a slightly bigger size than what i did buy so was little iffy bout these. they are snug for my fat body, but for the most part are comfy. they ride up a little bit as i work about but no chaffing so far, breathable, not falling down, etc. If your around a 52 waist or so they will be little snug but anything under you should be able to find your perfect fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: OK. Preferred over other briefs; however, they may not offer enough of a pouch..
Fit nice. Some support without crowding your junk. Wicking tech in general is b s but these shorts do have some vents that should help a bit.True to size. Very reasonable price.
I like that these briefs are colourful, light, flexible and breathable. I especially like the pocket, which provides comfort and support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Brilliantly supportive, light & cool pre & post hernia Op.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect value for money! I would like recommend to anyone not just to my friends!
